news.title: Trump says 8 European nations face tariffs rising to 25% if Greenland isn't sold to the U.S.
news.summary: Trump has hinted that he may pursue a tariff strategy on Greenland similar to the one he used to force foreign countries to change their drug prices.

news.title: Global week ahead: Hopes that cooler heads can prevail in Davos
news.summary: The tension between countries that call themselves allies is palpable going into this meeting. The tension between the U.S. and Russia is palpable.

news.title: Trump threatens to sue JPMorgan Chase for 'debanking' him
news.summary: President Trump threatened to sue JPMorgan for allegedly "debanking" him following the Jan. 6 insurrection in 2021. President Trump threatened the bank with a lawsuit following the January 6, 2021, insurrection.

news.title: Who will be next to implement an Australia-style under-16s social media ban?
news.summary: The House of Lords may vote next week on an under-16s social media ban. U.K. Prime Minister Keir Starmer expressed concerns about children's screen time.

news.title: Top Wall Street analysts are confident about these three stocks for the long term
news.summary: TipRanks highlights three stocks, including Broadcom and Meta Platforms, favored by Wall Street pros. TipRanks: Broadcom, Meta platforms, Broadcom.

news.title: I started working as a dishwasher at age 13. Social Security refuses to acknowledge this. Am I being cheated?
news.summary: “I am 69, and started collecting Social Security when I was 66½,” he says. “I started taking Social Security at the age of 66½.”

news.title: My wealthy friend invited me to stay, but he doesn’t need more ‘stuff.’ What do I get the man who has everything?
news.summary: “He has a beautiful home, and enough antiques and collectibles stored up over a lifetime,” his daughter says. “He’s got a lot of antiques,’ she adds.

news.title: These 20 cheap S&P 500 stocks can cushion the blow in a market downturn
news.summary: Conservative investors favor stocks trading at low P/E ratios. The long-term record proves them right, as shown by this chart of the S&P 500.

news.title: 14 million Americans are getting access to these game-changing investment accounts — without risking their Supplemental Security Income and Medicaid benefits
news.summary: ABLE accounts have expanded eligibility to those up to age 46. ABLE accounts are available to anyone with an ABLE account and can be used to pay for health care.

news.title: Trump plans 10% tariffs on European countries over Greenland: What it means for markets.
news.summary: Trump levels latest threat at Europe as Supreme Court decision on his tariffs loom. Supreme Court will rule on whether or not to uphold his tariffs.
